TopicTitle: do you want the graphics to look like the trailer???

Articles.Content: i like the ksp 2 trailer graphics so i thought why won't the devs make the game graphics like the trailer?

5 minutes ago, zemiel123 said:

why won't the devs make the game graphics like the trailer?

Is your PC a big-budget render farm?
Even that render farm would have a hard time running that in real time. Hence the name.
As we all know, modern graphics are technically unfeasible in KSP in principle, such is the law of the universe. This is done in other computer games, but in KSP2 it is impossible!

Do I 'want' it to?  Yes.

Do I expect it to?  No.  Trailers like that are works of cinema created as adverts, not gameplay (unles it explicitly says so).  It's simply unrealistic to expect it.
Seeing as the answer was posted a few times, this thread will surely lead to pointless bickering again, it shall be locked.
